alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Bee; Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Duval; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Nueces Islands; Victoria; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 10 at 2:51PM CST until January 12 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EXPECTED THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY... .A cold front will move across South Texas Thursday night into Friday morning. As a result, strong to very strong northwest winds combined with low relative humidity values are expected to result in Elevated to Critical fire weather conditions from late Thursday night through Friday afternoon. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND STRONG GUSTY WINDS FOR ALL OF SOUTH TEXAS... The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a Fire Weather Watch for low relative humidity and strong gusty winds, which is in effect from late Thursday night through Friday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...La Salle, McMullen, Live Oak, Bee, Goliad, Victoria, Webb, Duval, Jim Wells, Inland Kleberg, Inland Nueces, Inland San Patricio, Coastal Aransas, Inland Refugio, Inland Calhoun, Coastal Kleberg, Coastal Nueces, Coastal San Patricio, Aransas Islands, Coastal Refugio, Coastal Calhoun, Nueces Islands and Calhoun Islands. * TIMING... * WINDS...Northwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Up to 64. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
